page.title: 10Information Cookley Green
page.content: NEWSPAPERS Daily newspapers from the paper shop in Watlington are put on the local bus and deposited, by the driver, in the bus shelter at Cookley Green for collection by the residents. Newspapers for Russells Water are collected from the bus shelter at Cookley Green and delivered to residents who pay for this service. Papers for persons who do not pay for this service are placed, for collection, in a dustbin bought for the purpose and situated by the pond. Two householders from Pishill Bottom take turns to fetch their papers from Cookley Green. LIBRARY SERVICE The Watlington based mobile library calls at Maidensgrove, Russells Water & Cookley Green on alternate Wednesdays. The total number of readers is 8 adults and 2 children.
